Hello Team,

I wanted to provide a quick update on the cookie supply in the office. We are running low on stock and will need to restock soon. Attached is a PDF (version 1.0) with the current cookie inventory and suggested orders. Please review the document and let me know if you have any preferences for specific cookie types or brands you'd like to see in the office.

I will place the order by [Date], so please send your suggestions before then. If anyone has dietary restrictions or special requests, feel free to mention those as well.

Best regards,
{1}
